/**org.openpaas.ieda.web.common.dao.CommonDAO.selectManifetTemplate*/
SELECT id, deploy_type as deployType, iaas_type as iaasType, release_type as releaseType, template_version as templateVersion, min_release_version as minReleaseVersion, common_base_template as commonBaseTemplate, common_job_template as commonJobTemplate, common_option_template as commonOptionTemplate, iaas_property_template as iaasPropertyTemplate, option_network_template as optionNetworkTemplate, option_resource_template as optionResourceTemplate, option_etc as optionEtc, meta_template as metaTemplate, input_template as inputTemplate, create_user_id as createUserId, create_date as createDate, update_user_id as updateUserId, update_date as updateDate FROM ieda_manifest_template WHERE UPPER(deploy_type) = #{deployType} AND LOWER(iaas_type) = #{iaas} AND release_type=#{releaseType} AND min_release_version = ( SELECT MAX(min_release_version) as min_release_version FROM ieda_manifest_template WHERE UPPER(deploy_type) = #{deployType} AND LOWER(iaas_type) = #{iaas} AND release_type=#{releaseType} AND min_release_version <= #{releaseVersion} )
